backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the 80s movie catalog app, providing CRUD operations for movies and user profiles with role-based access control, pagination, and blob storage support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the MovieGrid/useQueries fix (loading, error, empty state handling) to its relevant source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON mapping of frontend source file paths to short descriptions of each file's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/docs/publishing.md: Guide explaining how to publish from Draft to Live in Caffeine, including a publishing checklist and troubleshooting steps for common issues like stopped canisters and blank login popups.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes used by shadcn-ui components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Russian-language 80s cinema PWA, setting metadata, icons, manifest link, and mounting the React app at #root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA web app manifest for 'Кино 80-х' defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets in multiple sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a network-first caching strategy for same-origin requests, with app shell caching on install and old cache cleanup on activate.
frontend/QA-delete-button-ownership.md: Manual QA checklist with step-by-step test cases to verify that the Delete button on movie cards correctly appears and disappears based on authenticated ownership without requiring a page refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and BackendAvailabilityProvider, then renders the main app layout with Header, MovieGrid, Footer, and dialogs, handling loading and backend-unavailable states.
frontend/src/components/AddMovieDialog.t: Dialog component for adding a new movie, handling form state for title, description, genres, and photo uploads (up to 3), with authentication guards and progress tracking via ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: UI component rendering a login/logout button using Internet Identity, clearing React Query cache on logout and handling already-authenticated edge cases.
frontend/src/components/BackendUnavailab: Full-screen error overlay displayed when the backend canister is unreachable, showing an error message, auto-retry countdown, and manual retry/reload buttons.
Floating mute/unmute button that plays a looping synthwave audio track via the Web Audio API, auto-playing on first user interaction if autoplay is blocked.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Page footer displaying copyright, a retro tagline, and links to PublishingHelpDialog and InstallHelpDialog components.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Page header with app title, a genre filter Select dropdown, an Add Movie button (auth-gated), and AuthControls, reporting backend unavailability errors from genre loading.
frontend/src/components/InstallHelpDialo: Dialog providing step-by-step PWA installation instructions for Android (Chrome) and iOS (Safari) users.
frontend/src/components/MovieCard.tsx: Displays a single movie as a card with photo cycling, genre badges, and a delete button (owner-only) with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/MovieDetailDialo: Modal dialog showing full movie details with a navigable photo gallery, genre badges, and metadata like year and description.
frontend/src/components/MovieGrid.tsx: Fetches and renders a paginated or genre-filtered grid of MovieCards, handling loading skeletons, offline state, and backend unavailability errors.
frontend/src/components/PaginationContro: Renders numbered pagination buttons with ellipsis logic for navigating between pages of movies.
frontend/src/components/PublishingHelpDi: Help dialog explaining how to publish the app from draft to production on Internet Computer and how to troubleshoot common backend errors.
frontend/src/components/VHSEffects.tsx: Renders animated retro VHS-style visual effects (scan lines, glitch, pixel noise) on a canvas overlay along with neon grid background images.
frontend/src/context/BackendAvailability: Provides a React context that tracks backend availability state ('checking', 'available', 'unavailable'), exposes error reporting and manual retry, and auto-retries queries every 10 seconds when the backend is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Wraps a backend health-check call in a React Query hook, exposing isHealthy and isChecking flags with a 15-second stale time and single retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend data operations (fetching movies, genres, pagination, filtering, and CRUD mutations), with backend-unavailability error handling integrated throughout.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS and defines a 1980s neon theme with custom CSS variables (hot pink, teal, amber on charcoal) plus retro utility classes and panel styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Provides normalizeError to convert errors into user-friendly Russian messages and isBackendUnavailableError to detect stopped-canister or actor-initialization failures.
frontend/src/utils/movieOwnership.ts: Exports a single helper function isMovieOwner that checks whether the currently authenticated user's principal matches a movie's creator field.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those values via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that sets up dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens (primary, sidebar, retro palette, charts), border radii, box shadows, and enables the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a fix request for a catalog page loading failure, tracking one existing feature fix (MovieGrid/React Query) and one pending backend audit task (Motoko actor crash).
